clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Mifepristone - Prostaglandin Analogue Combination in Medical Termination of Pregnancy Beyond 7 Weeks of Amenorrhea
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Mifepristone - Prostaglandin Analogue Combination in Medical Termination of Pregnancy Beyond 7 Weeks of Amenorrhea

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a non-interventional prospective, multicenter, longitudinal study conducted in France, among a representative sample of public and/or private birth control centers.
The aim of the study is to assess, in real-life settings, the success rate of the protocol Mifegyne / prostaglandin analogue in patients asking for medical abortion either prior or beyond 7 weeks of amenorrhea.

primary_outcome.measure: success rate of the protocol Mifegyne and prostaglandin analogue
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the follow-up at 2-3 weeks after inclusion
primary_outcome.description: The success rate will be defined as complete abortion without surgical procedure

secondary_outcome.measure: Success rate of the protocol Mifegyne and misoprostol per os.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the follow up at 2-3 weeks after the inclusion
secondary_outcome.description: The success rate will be defined as complete abortion without surgical procedure

secondary_outcome.measure: rate of ongoing pregnancy by term.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the follow up at 2-3 weeks after the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: rate of patients requiring any additional procedures by term.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the follow up at 2-3 weeks after the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of medical abortion using misoprostol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the follow up at 2-3 weeks after the inclusion
secondary_outcome.description: The number of medical abortion using misoprostol will be described.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation by patients of pain using a 5 level verbal rating scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the follow up at 2-3 weeks after the inclusion
secondary_outcome.description: Physician will ask patients to evaluate the pain by a 5 level verbal rating scale. the using of pain killers will be also described

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult women (≥ 18 years old) with confirmed intra-uterine pregnancy consulting for medical termination of pregnancy
- Patients for whom the physician decides to use a Mifegyne 600 mg and prostaglandin analogue combination for medical abortion
- Patients agreeing to participate in the study after having been informed orally by the physician and given the information sheet
- Informed patients accepting the computer processing of their medical data and their right of access and correction
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with known hypersensitivity to mifepristone
- Patients with known hypersensitivity to prostaglandin analogues (misoprostol or gemeprost).
- Patients with severe and progressive disease
- Patients with ectopic pregnancy
